meanings.definition: A large, hairy spider found in warm regions.
meanings.sent1: Tarantulas have eight legs and can be quite scary to some people.
meanings.sent2: I saw a tarantula crawling on the wall of the old shed.
meanings.sent3: The tarantulas decided to have a dance party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The tarantulas in the forest seemed like hairy shadows creeping in the night.
meanings.sent5: The tarantulas' hairy bodies and multiple eyes make them unique creatures.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fond of or enthusiastic about a specified thing.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a tarantula when it comes to collecting stamps.
meanings.sent2: She is a tarantula for fashion, always following the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The tarantula of chocolate couldn't resist another piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: He was a tarantula for knowledge, always reading and learning new things.
meanings.sent5: Being a tarantula for adventure, she was always seeking new experiences.
